attributes.action: BT's Champions League deal in the face of public subsidy
attributes.additional_details: We, the undersigned, hereby petition parliament to question why BT have paid £299 million per season for the rights to screen Champions League and Europa League football whilst they are receiving public subsidy for the maintenance and upgrade of their network.

rejection.details: This is something to raise with your MP to ask in Parliament.  Gvt does not interfere with operating decisions of companies.
